programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Angry Abnormal Atrocities of the Astute Animal Agressors - Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep36
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Confounding Concoction of the Crooked Combotato - A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep15
programme.desc: Super Cool Big Kids Inc. - Convinced old people are the new enemy, Boss Baby uses Tim to create havoc at the senior center, but a war soon begins when the seniors rally against babies

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep16
programme.desc: P.U. - Boss Baby must "de-stink" Simmons after a misfire of Stinkless Serum, and Tim & Danny try to upgrade their small- scale taxi business

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep14
programme.desc: Doom and Groom - Po and the team have one last attempt to get the pendant, but they will have to disrupt Jayesh's wedding, and contend with his guards, to do so. At the mage island, Klaus and Veruca get hold of the Tianshang helmet.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep15
programme.desc: The Pinging - Mr. Ping is possessed by the ghost of Master Mastodon, the ancient master sworn to protect the Tianshang storm wheels. After a ghostly sewer chase, Mastodon agrees to help our team to stop Klaus and Veruca. He reveals that their next step is to go across the sea to Central America.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep55
programme.desc: Caballo Sin Cabeza - When the famous headless horse shows up in town, the San Lorenzans must turn to an unlikely hero to help save the day.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep56
programme.desc: My Fair Demon - When a kind, gentle Demon with dreams of being evil emerges from the portal, Puss and the team do their best to teach the monster how to be bad

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Pony Tales Ep56
programme.desc: The Healing Tree - While riding back to Miradero, the girls get lost -- and Abigail's horse gets bitten by a snake! Can an old friend's skills help save the day?

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Pony Tales Ep57
programme.desc: The Mystery of the Golden Unicorn - After finding a majestic horse in the wild, Lucky and the girls set out to solve the mystery of where she came from -- and where she truly belongs.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep28
programme.desc: Don't Worry Be Peppy / Two's A Cloud - When Poppy worries that her father doesnt feel useful now thats hes no longer King, she asks her friends to bring Peppy small problems to solve. But will Peppy be able to face a real threat, in the form of a swamp monster?/When Cloud Guy moves into Branchs bunker, Branch will do whatever it takes to get his unwanted roommate to leave- including inviting his annoying cloud parents over.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep2
programme.desc: Tacos / Rainy Day - When Kelp is introduced to crunchy tacos in Unicorn Land, he must use his bubble sparks to bring them back to his family underwater. / Kelps unicorn friends are going to teach him Swishbee on land. But it rains and the game is called off until Kelp shows them that playing in the water can be even more fun.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! Ep28
programme.desc: Tough Cookies / More Than Meets the Tie - Tag's scooter breaks down during a Race Cadet challenge to deliver boxes of Sam Whippets Chocolate Chippets the fastest. So Tag and Scooch must rely on other ways of getting around town. / Muttfield the Magnificent is set to perform a magic show at Yips birthday party! Until he accidentally makes himself disappear. Muttfield instructs Tag and Scooch to retrieve three magical items to make him appear again. But can they do it in time?

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep6
programme.desc: Lula's Last Stand / Triple Trouble - Little Lula has set up a lemonade stand, but shes not getting any business. The Zenkos swing into action to send customers her way. / When Donna, Fawna and Rona have a spat, the triplets longstanding annual tradition of viewing a comet together is in jeopardy. Now its up to Team Zenko to get the three feuding sisters back together again before the comet streaks by.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep2
programme.desc: Deep Trouble - Dak's lack of planning gets him, Cutter and Winger lost with Elbone in the Maze Caves, and Leyla's overthinking threatens the effort to rescue them.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep2
programme.desc: Blue Dragon Plays with Fire - When the kids grow over-confident after beginning their training, they decide to intercept a distress call and sneak off without permission, only to land themselves in hot water

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep5
programme.desc: Jin's New Look - On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctors coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Mortys five babies.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep6
programme.desc: A Cabbage Kinda Day - Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Mortys babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but its too much and she accidentally loses Mini-Morty. Shes going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep2
programme.desc: The Iron Gronkle - When Meatlug accidentally ingests magnetic rocks, she becomes magnetic herself causing destruction through the town, but ultimately helping the kids win a battle against the Outcasts.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep3
programme.desc: The Night And the Fury - The kids go on a training mission on Dragon Island, where Hiccup runs into an old enemy Dagur!

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep4
programme.desc: Tunnel Vision - When the towns well runs dry, Hiccup and Toothless discover a group of baby Whispering Death dragons living in the tunnels underneath, planted there by Alvin.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep6
programme.desc: The Constipation Situation - Boss Baby struggles to take a sick day even though a mysterious baby cry is wreaking havoc on the neighborhood baby-love

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep7
programme.desc: The Boss Babysitter - Mom and Dad Templeton do the unthinkable: leave Boss Baby and Tim under the authority of a babysitter!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep20
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Blitzkrieg of the Bothersome Butt-erflies - As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep21
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Problematic Pandemonium of the Punishing Plungerina - After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep28
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Angry Abnormal Atrocities of the Astute Animal Agressors - Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep37
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ludicrous Lunacy of the Loopy Laserlightmare - Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep38
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shocking Showdown of the Staggering Sugamechangere - It's parents' weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupp's eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep39
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Polarizing Plight of the Pitiless Poopetrators - George and Harold want Cash Networth to buy the camp and fire Krupp. But before he'll agree to pony up the dough, Cash has a small request of his own.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep28
programme.desc: Where The Koobish Roam / Best Friendiversary - On a Koobish cattle drive together, Tip and Krunkle's differences result in Oh and the herd getting lost in a stampede; Tip and Oh can't agree on how to celebrate their Friendiversary

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep28
programme.desc: Mighty Snails/Silent But Deadly - Burn is forced to coach a lousy tetherball team -- and gets inspired by an old rival; White Shadow's karate skills are tested by a ninja stinkbug.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep28
programme.desc: Speed - Ty can't stop rolling after Skrap-It steals his master cylinder, so the Trux must quickly figure out a fix before he falls off the edge of a cliff

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep28
programme.desc: Where's Woof? - When Woof disappears into the magic suitcase, Wally and Wenda launch an international search for their happily wandering puppy. Our favorite Wanderers from around the world return to help our heroes find Woof in this globetrotting adventure.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep27
programme.desc: The Ball Badge - The Squirrels are confused when they see Duggee sitting on a ball because they all have their own favourite way of using it, whether it be kicking, throwing or catching.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep28
programme.desc: The News Badge - After learning that Duggee is making his yearly batch of blueberry jam, a tradition passed on from his great-aunt, the Squirrels decide to spread the news.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Himalayan Heroes, Nepal - Hoping to follow in his great-aunt's footsteps, Glitch enlists the help of a sceptical Foz and a friendly yak in order to find a yeti in the Himalayas.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Monkey Bay, Thailand - Glitch's plans to open a hotel on an unspoilt beach in Thailand go horribly wrong when a group of macaque monkeys steal his Grim-o-freeze gun.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep13
programme.desc: Cheddar Gorge, England - Glitch fills Cheddar Gorge with a river of melted cheese, turning it into a giant cheese fondue. Can the Go Jetters rescue the tourists and sheep from the cheesiest glitch ever?

programme.desc: Choekyi's Tibetan Spinach Momos - Choekyi is making momos, which are a type of dumpling.

programme.title: Bual Bisnes #1 (New)
programme.desc: Bual Bisnes merupakan sebuah program bual bicara santai dan berinformasi yang meneroka secara mendalam landskap perniagaan tempatan. Setiap episod memberi fokus kepada pelbagai sektor utama Perusahaan Kecil dan Sederhana (PKS) seperti F&B, automotif, kesihatan serta francais. Program ini menampilkan temu bual eksklusif bersama pakar industri, usahawan berjaya dan pemimpin perniagaan, bagi berkongsi pandangan, kisah kejayaan serta amalan terbaik. Matlamat utama Bual Bisnes adalah untuk mendidik penonton tentang peranan penting sektor perniagaan dalam menjana pertumbuhan ekonomi negara.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Sushi Truth
programme.desc: Sushi is an iconic dish of Japan, with nigirizushi being the most popular style. We take a look at its evolution and the creation of key ingredients.

programme.title: Cinematic Journey
programme.desc: Join our explorers as they pursue the cinematic beauty of Japan. Kyle Card hikes the newly designated long trail around majestic Mt. Fuji and discovers its secrets.

programme.desc: A selection of acclaimed programs from NHK's domestic channels dubbed into English.

programme.title: J-Melo
programme.desc: Join May J. for great Japanese music! In the studio this week: singer-songwriter and guitar star Rei; and singer-songwriter Ieiri Leo, who brings a unique sensibility and a great voice to her music.

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-5.

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini
programme.desc: "Keitora" are Japanese light pickup trucks. They're used to transport goods, but that's far from their only role. In a 5-minute digest, we discover the surprising possibilities of keitora.

programme.title: A Cat'S-Eye View Of Japan
programme.desc: Kitties are always fighting in an otherwise quiet ally in downtown Osaka. You can even spar a brave kitty at a local boxing gym!

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Cycle Around Japan Highlights
programme.desc: Shiga, site of Lake Biwa, Japan's largest lake, is home to centuries-old crafts like Shigaraki ware and Wana velvet. We explore an island in the lake by tricycle before climbing into the mountains.

programme.title: Design Ah Neo: Ears
programme.desc: Design is fun! Design feels good! Cutting-edge images and music guide children to enjoy exploring the ideas and tweaks in the designs all around us. An episode on Ears.

programme.title: Mitateru-Phose #5
programme.desc: This program employs "mitateru," a Japanese technique, to inspire children's imagination by encouraging them to view objects differently and develop their unique perspectives and creativity.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep7
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Machado Garry vs. Prates
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFCs return to Kansas City on April 27 features a five-round main event clash between two of the welterweight divisions top fighters, as Irish star Ian Machado Garry squares off against Brazilian finisher Carlos Prates at UFC Fight Night in T-Mobile Center. Making his first start since a memorable five-round war with Shavkat Rakhmonov, Machado Garry hopes to punch his ticket to a place in the title conversation, but the surging Prates has been unstoppable since arriving in the UFC with four knockout wins, and he intends on making his own case for a crack at the crown

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Sandhagen vs. Figueiredo
programme.desc: Prelims - On May 4, the UFC Octagon sets down in Des Moines, Iowa for the first time for a UFC Fight Night card at Wells Fargo Arena featuring two elite bantamweights fighting for a place in the title conversation. A former flyweight champion looking for his fourth win since moving to 135 pounds, Deiveson Figueiredo is chasing a historic second divisional title, but to move closer to that goal, hell have to get by Cory Sandhagen, a fellow top five contender who owns wins over Frankie Edgar, Marlon Vera and Rob Font.
